metadata.title: CVE-2017-6814 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In WordPress before 4.7.3, there is authenticated Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via Media File Metadata. This is demonstrated by both (1) mishandling of the playlist shortcode in the wp_playlist_shortcode function in wp-includes/media.php and (2) mishandling of meta information in the renderTracks function in wp-includes/js/mediaelement/wp-playlist.js.

advisory.discovered_by: Chris Andr√® Dale, Yorick Koster, and Simon P. Briggs

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.3+dfsg-1').
